name: Flight Of The Penguin: Free Addicting Flying Animal Games for Fun
name_original: Flight Of The Penguin: Free Addicting Flying Animal Games for Fun
description:
Get ready to start bouncing! This fun and addicting Penguin game is full of hours of entertainment. This poor little penguins wings are too small to fly. Help him achieve his dreams of flying through the skies by drawing trampolines for him to bounce on and move forward through the game. Very easy to play, but very hard to master. You'll be swiping and bouncing for hours! Cute and fun graphics and sounds. Game Center for high scores!

Tap DOWNLOAD to get this one for FREE now!
